long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A very early, although already mostly working, version. 
Useful when the built-in Network tab in the DevTools is not enough - e.g. when you need to check the network requests and responses of an automatically closed window.
The design will be changed in future versions. Hopefully, the functionality will be improved too.
It might still contain various bugs and imperfections.
